attributes.action: Allow Children in their Senior years at School longer school holidays.
attributes.background: This will allow children in High School an extra week off school so they can prepare for exams and help refuse the pressure on them during their exams in year eleven.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. Schools are already able to offer study leave to pupils who are preparing for exams, so we're not sure exactly what changes you'd like to see. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
